sentence: Can do just a lunch and return on Ferry
There really is not any beach other than by the restaurant but they have lovely docks that have loungers facing the water for your relaxation
My only complaints are that we were not advised we had a Full Meal Plan and exactly what that included so we did not take advantage of the various courses for each meal
Beware the key deer downright adorable but they will come right up and eat off your plate if they can get away with it
Instead meals are extra as well as mini bar snacks and transportation to and from Marathon Key to Little Torch Key by car was quite expensive
A la carte items on the dinner menu ran in the range of 50 for an entree
Not complimentary were the little packages of nuts candies etc which ran 7 12 for things like cashews or MMs

For a resort at which we spent well over 300 for 2 nights not including meals we did not sample the spa facilities at all did not take any excursions such as snorkeling or diving dolphin encounter etc or purchase anything except meals
The tasting menu was 100 per person not including any wine
A few neraby restaurants and bars can be accessed by boat ride
Dinner we had the chef special Fillet lobster with foie gras

Its accessible by boat or seaplane onlyWe call it summer camp for adults b c you have full free use of all the water toys kayaks paddle boards small sailboats fishing rodsthere are several flat skiff motor boats available to scoot around the island OR go snorkeling to Boy Scout Reef or Picnic IslandWe saw nurse sharks spotted stingrays goliath grouperslobstersMy husband even caught 6tarpon in 2 days off the dock after dinner
We loved our two prior dinner excursions to LPI and were looking forward to our first over night stay
beach activities great restaurant and so much more
After we headed to our private dinner in the gazebo
We had exceptional dinners here and the service preparation and presentation were all 5 star in our opinion
A nice treat to spend a non rushed lunch overlooking the white sand beach on a picture perfect day
Everyone from the dining room to the beach staff can not do enough to make your stay perfect
This place is so quiet and peaceful and other than at dinner very rarely did we see too many other people which was nice
One of the best resorts we have ever been to service accommodations dining were all spectacular
